title: Top 9 Best SAW Characters #4 | SAW-Tober 2020
author: Reel Talk
comment: Awesome video! I really enjoyed her character and I hated how quickly they killed her in 3. I think she deserved to be the lead and main character in 3 or 4.

Detective Kerry was indeed smart. From the very beginning, she was involved in the case of the gruesome killings that she had to spend a lot of time solving the puzzle. Her cooperation with Tapp was a really interesting and fruitful well-knit duo. But after Tapp's death, the mystery of the murder did not fall asleep and more victims entangled by you mystery into macabre games. And she had to continue searching, she still had Eric Matthews at her disposal, with whom she had an affair, and that is where Eric's family problems began. but the design of this trap must be her business, after all, it's not John's style.
just imaging swapping rigg for kerry in saw 3 & 4... INSTANT MAGIC
imagine Strahm's death but it's Kerry and Hoffman. oh my that'd be so fucking cool
They should never have killed her in the trap it would have been awesome if she made it
